title: Craig Johson: Consumer Is a Lot Worse Than Experts Think(Audio)
itunes:title: Craig Johson: Consumer Is a Lot Worse Than Experts Think(Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Craig Johnson, President of Customer Growth Partners, on the retail sector and today's retail eps: Target, Lowes, and Staples.
